definition: car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159
used in place names, notably Kunlun Mountains 崑崙|昆仑[Kun1 lun2]/(also used for transliteration)
descendant/elder brother/a style of Chinese poetry

sentences.english: The current galvanizing mill will be removed and the six-high mill will be built in its place.
sentences.chinese: 目前镀锌厂将被删除，将在其位置上兴建的六辊轧机。

sentences.english: Eachindependent cylinder's press-roller has precision micro-adjuster to guarantee the effect of sueding .
sentences.chinese: 每支独立汽缸压布辊精确的微调，能确保磨毛效果。

sentences.english: UV coated photosensitive dry roll production lines.
The article describes the structural features and configuration of the edger stand with whole hydraulic screw-down for HCM Rough mills.
sentences.chinese: 简要介绍全液压压下立辊轧机的结构特点及组成。

sentences.english: Adopts air swelling shaft roll furling roller, convenient for production.
sentences.chinese: 采用气涨轴收卷辊，方便生产。

sentences.english: Use a foam roll for hip flexor and quads doing one leg at a time.
sentences.chinese: 使用泡沫辊髋屈肌和四芯做一次一条腿。

sentences.english: Moreover, the reactive force between slab and roller is obtained in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 此外，还得出了铸坯对夹辊的作用力。

sentences.english: Introduced in the paper is a newly developed centring-roll system used on the rotary pipe mill.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种用于斜轧钢管生产的新式定心辊装置。

sentences.english: Steady rollin woman gonna come my way.
sentences.chinese: 稳步辊女子前来自首途中。

sentences.english: The spalling reason of the roller surface for cold rolling is complicated.
sentences.chinese: 冷轧工作辊表面发生剥落掉块的原因是复杂的。

sentences.english: The main part of apricot nuclear crushing engine-crushing roller is designed and studied in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 对杏核破壳机的主要部件挤压辊进行了设计研究。

sentences.english: Delilah hits the casinos and discovers that she's a natural-born high-roller.
sentences.chinese: 利拉打赌场，发现她是一个天生的高辊。

sentences.english: The configuration of roller table speed regulation system is emphasized.
sentences.chinese: 着重介绍了辊道调速系统的构成。

sentences.english: A wise king winnows out the wicked; he drives the threshing wheel over them.
sentences.chinese: 智慧的王，簸散恶人，用碌碡辊轧他们。

sentences.english: It's a simple machine with a belt and rollers that you move with your effort.
sentences.chinese: 这是一个简单的机器用皮带辊道，你将与你的努力。

sentences.english: Roller mills grind essentially by crushing and attrition .
sentences.chinese: 辊磨机主要靠挤压和摩擦研碎物料。

definition: end face/end surface of a cylindrical object
shining metal/(old) the 16th of the month (abbreviation used in telegrams)
